import React from 'react'; import { useState } from 'react'; import Axios from 'axios'; const style = { fontSize: '30px', fontFamily: 'serif', backgroundColor: '#F8F8FF', textTransform: 'uppercase', textAlign: 'center', }; const style1 = { color: 'black', fontSize: '30px', fontFamily: 'serif', backgroundColor: '#F8F8FF', textAlign: 'center', textTransform: 'uppercase', }; const style2 = { color: 'white', fontFamily: 'sans-serif', fontSize: '20px', backgroundColor: 'black', textAlign: 'center', display: 'inline-block', padding: '0.5em 3em', border: '0.16em solid #FFFFFF', margin: '0 0.3em 0.3em 0', boxSizing: 'border-box', textDecoration: 'none', textTransform: 'uppercase', fontWeight: '400', transition: 'all 0.15s', }; const Menu =()=> { return (


Burger King Menu Whopper Whiskey River BBQ Burger Bacon Cheeseburger Shake Shack Burger






); } export default Menu;
